mapper.sql: SELECT A.name name ,A.name titleInUrl ,A.seq seq ,A.korean_name koreanName ,A.version version ,A.type type ,(select B.attribute1desc from common_code B where common_set = 'misc_type' and A.type = B.common_code) as typeKorean ,misc_use miscUse ,A.time time ,A.amount amount ,A.amount_is_weight amountIsWeight ,A.use_for useFor ,(select B.attribute1desc from common_code B where common_set = 'misc_use_for' and A.use_for = B.common_code) as useForKorean ,A.notes notes ,A.insert_id insertId ,A.insert_date insertDate ,A.update_id updateId ,A.update_date updateDate ,A.delete_id deleteId ,A.delete_date deleteDate FROM brewduckdb.MISC A

SELECT b.name name ,b.korean_name koreanName ,b.version version ,b.type type ,a.misc_use miscUse ,a.time time ,a.amount amount ,b.amount_is_weight amountIsWeight ,b.use_for useFor ,b.notes notes ,b.insert_id insertId ,b.insert_date insertDate ,b.update_id updateId ,b.update_date updateDate ,b.delete_id deleteId ,b.delete_date deleteDate FROM brewduckdb.RECIPE_MISC a LEFT OUTER join brewduckdb.MISC b on a.misc_seq = b.seq WHERE a.misc_seq = b.seq
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '2') spiceCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '2') as spiceCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '3') flavorCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '3') as flavorCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '4') waterAgentCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '4') as waterAgentCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '5') finingCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '5') as finingCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '6') herbCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '6') as herbCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MISC WHERE TYPE = '1') otherCnt, (SELECT B.attribute1desc FROM common_code B WHERE common_set = 'misc_type' AND B.common_code = '1') as otherCntName
